data.oai_dc:dc: Hemmings Birkhead 2017 PRSB Differential sperm storage data

This data file contains data on the number of sperm from different male zebra finches with long or short sperm, stored in the sperm storage tubules of females who had mated with both males. It also contains data on the number of sperm from both males that reached the perivitelline layer of the ovum. See associated README file for further details.
cryptic female choice|postcopulatory sexual selection|sperm competition|sperm storage tubules
